title: CBC Radio
text:
Laurie Elliott and Kyle Brownrigg spice up their arguments in their debate on everything pumpkin.

Laurie Elliott carves out her points and says she just can't get enough pumpkin!

Come fall, I bleed orange. I especially love pumpkin spice lattes or PSL's as I like to call them. They're like drinking liquid Pottery Barn! - Laurie Elliott

But Kyle Brownrigg squashes this notion and says our obsession with pumpkin-themed products has gotten out of control.

They now have pumpkin spice body lotion, pumpkin spice shampoo, pumpkin spice body spray—ladies, are you trying to pickle yourselves? - Kyle Brownrigg

Don't try to Hallo-ween yourself off this debate! Click play now!
description: Laurie Elliott and Kyle Brownrigg spice up their arguments in their debate on everything pumpkin.
